---
name: Translation Review
about: Request review of a language translation
title: "[LANG] Review: "
labels: translation
assignees: ''
---

## Language
- **Language code:** (e.g., `de`)
- **Language name:** (e.g., German / Deutsch)

## Type
- [ ] New translation (needs full review)
- [ ] Correction to existing translation
- [ ] Partial translation (some codes missing)

## Reviewer Requirements
- Native speaker of the target language
- Understanding of emergency/medical terminology in the target language

## Specific Concerns
Are there any codes you're unsure about? Any terms that could be ambiguous?

## File
Link to the language file or PR.
